name: Purity Ring
description: '''Purity Ring''' is a Canadian [[electronic pop]] band from [[Edmonton]], [[Alberta]], Canada, formed in 2010. The band consists of multi-instrumentalist/producer Corin Roddick and vocalist Megan James. They released their debut album ''[[Shrines (Purity Ring album)|Shrines]]'' in 2012 to critical acclaim, followed by ''[[Another Eternity]]'' in 2015 and ''[[Womb (album)|Womb]]'' in 2020. The band released an EP, ''Graves'', on June 3, 2022.
